subject: Re: [R] xyplot: Combining 'subscripts' and 'allow.multiple=T'
body:
On 4/20/07, Sundar Dorai-Raj  wrote:>> Hi, Deepayan,>> Neither Søren nor I mentioned sessionInfo, which may be the reason our> error messages differ from yours:>>  > sessionInfo()> R version 2.4.1 (2006-12-18)> i386-pc-mingw32>> locale:> LC_COLLATE=English_United States.1252;LC_CTYPE=English_United> States.1252;LC_MONETARY=English_United> States.1252;LC_NUMERIC=C;LC_TIME=English_United States.1252>> attached base packages:> [1] "grid"      "stats"     "graphics"  "grDevices" "utils"     "datasets"> [7] "methods"   "base">> other attached packages:>    lattice> "0.14-17"
Yes, mine is R-devel. Anyway, I only meant that it's an interestingdifference; I don't think there's much point in tracking this down.
-Deepayan
______________________________________________R-help@stat.math.ethz.ch mailing listhttps://stat.ethz.ch/mailman/listinfo/r-helpPLEASE do read the posting guide http://www.R-project.org/posting-guide.htmland provide commented, minimal, self-contained, reproducible code.
